long_description: The intermediate-level Lange RX 100 ski boots blend a medium flex with snug footbeds so you can comfortably ski hard all day on steep slopes without feeling like your feet are stuck in a vice. With a medium flex index, Lange RX 100 ski boots provide the responsive power transfer preferred by aggressive intermediate skiers. Shells, liners and snug, 100mm footbeds are based on a composite scan of thousands of skiers' feet for anatomic accuracy and comfort. Shells are designed to create a centered, balanced stance on rockered skis to increase efficiency of technique and reduce fatigue. Uniform-density plastic shells ensure highly efficient power transfer, smooth flex and finely-tuned responsiveness, even in frigid temperatures. Control Fit liners conform to your feet for a comfortable, high-performance fit; liners may be custom molded using a heat treatment. Specially designed insteps provide an excellent fit at the midfoot, resulting in increased circulation and greater warmth. 1-piece toe boxes and tongues eliminate seams and overlaps in the tongue-attachment area to reduce pressure points at the instep and top of the toes. Rubber soles offer excellent grip.
